is a leading social media publishing and marketing company, at the intersection of content and commerce and driving the shoppable content revolution, with more than 200 employees, 180 million fans, and 1.5 billion monthly views. Our brands , ,, and inspire our global audience daily. With an average annual growth rate of 50% over the past five years, along with multiple Fortune 500 partners, we are leading the next generation in shoppable content.First Media’s Performance Marketing division is one of the fastest-growing full-service Direct Response agencies. Our production team is a powerhouse of relatable video content for a modern-day opt-in viewer, specializing in new and iterative DR video ads that drive massive scale for our partners. With our triple-threat experts in digital publishing, adtech, and performance, we’re uniquely positioned in today’s marketplace.We are looking for a curious, strategic Director of Business Intelligence to lead our data analysts. You’ll be responsible for reporting actionable insights related to our paid media campaigns to key stakeholders across the division. This is a unique opportunity to be a part of a fast-growing, data-driven video company operating across lifestyle verticals including food, health, beauty, parenting, home, and entertainment.Responsibilities:Understand and analyze the daily performance and trends of accountsWork with leaders and the exec to understand the health of the advertising ecosystem.Lead ad hoc investigations of performance, coordinating multiple teams and departments to determine root causes and help find solutionsDevelop and implement strategies for data collection, analysis, and reportingWork closely with the executive team and other stakeholders to ensure that BI is aligned and aiding with the overall goals and objectivesAutomate reports and provide custom reporting and metrics for internal and external teams and stakeholdersGrow and develop a small team, investing in career development through ongoing coaching, feedback, and trainingQualifications:A Bachelor's or Master's Degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Applied Math, Economics, Statistics, Analytics, etc)4+ years of relevant experience, media industry preferredExperience conducting quantitative and qualitative analysis with analytics techniques to solve defined business problemsLeadership acumen and experience managing and developing a teamProgramming expertise (emphasis on Python, R, SQL)Data management and visualization skills/tools (Tableau preferred)Ability to interact professionally and communicate effectively and cross-functionally with both internal contacts (Executive Team, Paid Media, Production, Sales) and external contacts (Clients, Vendors)Detail-oriented; able to prioritize, meet deadlines, organize, and demonstrate analytical skills and follow-throughFirst Media provides competitive compensation and benefits, including top-shelf health insurance packages (medical, dental, and vision insurance), unlimited PTO, 401K employer matching, and so much more.First Media is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.Powered by JazzHRWbRdcGfirn
